titleStmt.title: The harmony of the world being a discourse wherein the phænomena of nature are consonantly salved and adapted to inferiour intellects / by John Heydon, Gent. ...
titleStmt.author: Heydon, John, b. 1629.

notesStmt.note: Title on added t.p. The harmony of the world, being a discourse of God, heaven, angels, stars, planets, earth ... the art of preparing Rosie Crucian medicines to cure all diseases ... London : Printed for Robert Horn, 1662.
Commendatory verses by John Gadbury, John Booker, and others.
Reproduction of original in Princeton University Library.
